name: Hyperion Space Force: Rise of the Zeti
name_original: Hyperion Space Force: Rise of the Zeti
description:
Hyperion Space Force: Rise of the Zeti is a small game in which the player controls a spaceship as a pilot for earth. the Zeti Confederate has declared war on Earth its up to you to defend earth and ensure victory in the upcoming war

Modification 1:

charged bullets - mechanic 

when holding down the m1 button the player can charge bullets to shoot a stronger shot

charged bullet - sprite and animation

the charged bullet is visually distinct from the normal bullets being larger and have a blue appearance

shooting controller script - changed the script of the shooting controller in order to add in the charged bullets

Modification 2:

better game setting and story

-added a story to the game so the player has a purpose for going through the levels and seeing them to  competition

-before each level there is a dialogue or narrative that gives basis of next level

-added a boss fight at end of game 

-boss fight has altered enemy script and projectiles homing in on the player

Modification 3:

Menu has been improved upon

-added background to make menu more visually appealing

-added instructions page for the game mechanics so the player know unique mechanics they can use
